Class MovableGridItem

java.lang.Object
mayflower.Actor
MovableGridItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Block
public class MovableGridItem extends mayflower.Actor
Represents an item in the game grid that can move.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MovableGridItem()
    Constructs a MovableGridItem instance with no target destination and zero velocity and acceleration.

  • Method Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • MovableGridItem

      public MovableGridItem()
      Constructs a MovableGridItem instance with no target destination and zero velocity and acceleration.

  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act()
      Updates the position of the grid item based on its velocity and acceleration. If the item reaches or surpasses its target destination, it snaps to the target destination and stops moving.
      Specified by:
      act in class mayflower.Actor

    • getTargetDestination

      public Coordinate getTargetDestination()
      Gets the target destination of the grid item.
      Returns:
      The target destination as a Coordinate.

    • setTargetDestination

      public void setTargetDestination(Coordinate targetDestination)
      Sets the target destination for the item.
      Parameters:
      targetDestination - The target destination coordinate.

    • setAx

      public void setAx(double ax)
      Sets the acceleration in the x direction.
      Parameters:
      ax - The acceleration in the x direction.

    • setAy

      public void setAy(double ay)
      Sets the acceleration in the y direction.
      Parameters:
      ay - The acceleration in the y direction.
